description: 基于 ClickHouse + Vector 的NGINX请求日志分析看板。包括请求与耗时分析、异常请求分析、用户分析、地理位置分布图、指定接口分析、请求日志明细。https://grafana.com/orgs/starsliao/dashboards

targets.rawSql:
SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time, count() / 15 AS "今日最大QPS"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE toDate(timestamp) = today() and server_ip in (${server_ip})
	GROUP BY time

SELECT toStartOfMinute(timestamp) AS time, sum(request_length) * 8 / 60 as "今日最大请求量"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE toDate(timestamp) = today() and server_ip in (${server_ip}) 
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfMinute(timestamp) AS time, sum(response_length) * 8 / 60 as "今日最大返回量"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE toDate(timestamp) = today()  and server_ip in (${server_ip}) 
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 60 SECOND) AS time,countIf(status<400)/count() *100 as "请求成功率"
FROM ${project} 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
group by time
order by time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time, count()/15 AS "实时QPS"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
	GROUP BY time
  order by time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time,avg(responsetime) as "实时响应时间"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN status >= 200 AND status < 300 THEN '2XX'
        WHEN status >= 300 AND status < 400 THEN '3XX'
        WHEN status >= 400 AND status < 500 THEN '4XX'
        WHEN status >= 500 AND status < 600 THEN '5XX'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS status_category,
    COUNT(*) AS count
FROM ${project}
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
GROUP BY 
    status_category
order BY
    status_category

SELECT
toStartOfMinute(timestamp) AS time,
    CASE
        WHEN responsetime >= 0 AND responsetime <= 0.01 THEN '0-10'
        WHEN responsetime > 0.01 AND responsetime <= 0.025 THEN '0-25'
        WHEN responsetime > 0.025 AND responsetime <= 0.05 THEN '1-50'
        WHEN responsetime > 0.05 AND responsetime <= 0.1 THEN '2-100'
        WHEN responsetime > 0.1 AND responsetime <= 0.25 THEN '3-250'
        WHEN responsetime > 0.25 AND responsetime <= 0.5 THEN '4-500'
        WHEN responsetime > 0.5 AND responsetime <= 1 THEN '5-1000'
        WHEN responsetime > 1 AND responsetime <= 3 THEN '6-3000'
        ELSE 'N-MAX'
    END AS status_category,
    COUNT() AS count
FROM ${project}
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and status=200
GROUP BY 
    time,status_category
order BY
    time,status_category

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time,
  quantileExact(0.99)(responsetime) as P99
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and status=200
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time,
  quantileExact(0.90)(responsetime) as P90
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and status=200
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time,
  quantileExact(0.50)(responsetime) as P50
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and status=200
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time,
  quantileExact(0.75)(responsetime) as P75
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and status=200
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time,
  quantileExact(0.95)(responsetime) as P95
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and status=200
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time,avg(responsetime) as "平均"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and status=200
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
	  `top_path`, COUNT() AS PV, COUNT(DISTINCT client_ip) as "UV",avg(response_length) as "平均返回"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
	GROUP BY `top_path`
  order by COUNT() DESC

SELECT
	  `top_path`,avg(responsetime) as "HTTP200平均响应时间"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and status = 200
	GROUP BY `top_path`

SELECT `top_path`,
countIf(status >=400 and status < 500) as 4XX,
countIf(status>=500) as 5XX
FROM ${project}
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
GROUP BY 
    `top_path`

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time,upstreamhost,avg(responsetime) as rt
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
GROUP BY time,upstreamhost
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time,avg(responsetime) as rt
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time, upstreamhost, count() / 15 AS avgqps
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
	GROUP BY time,upstreamhost
  order by time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time, count() / 15 AS avgqps
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
	GROUP BY time
  order by time

panels.title: 各后端每秒收到请求数(QPS)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time, upstreamhost, count() / 15 AS avgqps
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
	GROUP BY time,upstreamhost
  order by time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time, count() / 15 AS avgqps
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
	GROUP BY time
  order by time

panels.title: 各后端每秒收到请求数占比

targets.rawSql:
SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 60 SECOND) AS time,toString(status), count(status)  AS HTTP
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and status != 200
	GROUP BY time,status
  order by time

SELECT
	  request_method, 
    COUNT()
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
	GROUP BY request_method
  order by COUNT() DESC

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time,avg(responsetime) as rt
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time,server_ip,avg(responsetime) as rt
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
GROUP BY time,server_ip
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time, server_ip, count() / 15 AS avgqps
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
	GROUP BY time,server_ip
  order by time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time, count() / 15 AS avgqps
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
	GROUP BY time
  order by time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time, server_ip, count() / 15 AS avgqps
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
	GROUP BY time,server_ip
  order by time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time, count() / 15 AS avgqps
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
	GROUP BY time
  order by time

panels.title: 各NGINX每秒收到请求数占比

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toStartOfMinute(timestamp) as time,
  count() as value,top_path,toString(status) as "状态"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and status >= 500
GROUP BY time,status,top_path
ORDER BY time

panels.title: HTTP 异常状态码(每分钟累计)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	  `domain` as "域名", count() as PV,COUNT(DISTINCT client_ip) as UV,avg(responsetime) as "平均响应时间"

	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
	GROUP BY `domain`
  order by COUNT() DESC

SELECT
	  `path` as "请求路径", avg(responsetime) as "平均响应时间",COUNT() AS PV, COUNT(DISTINCT client_ip) as "UV",avg(response_length) as "平均返回量"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
	GROUP BY `path`
	HAVING PV >100
  order by avg(responsetime) DESC
	LIMIT 30;

SELECT
	  `path` as "请求路径",quantileExact(0.90)(duration) as "P90NG处理时间",avg(response_length) as "平均返回量", avg(responsetime) as "平均响应时间",COUNT() AS PV, COUNT(DISTINCT client_ip) as "UV"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
	GROUP BY `path`
	HAVING PV > 10
  order by "P90NG处理时间" DESC
	LIMIT 30;

panels.title: P90 NGINX处理耗时最慢 TOP30（PV>10）

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	  referer as Referer, 
    COUNT() as "PV", COUNT(DISTINCT client_ip) as "UV"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
	GROUP BY referer
  order by COUNT() DESC
	LIMIT 30;

SELECT
	  `path` as "请求路径", COUNT() AS PV, COUNT(DISTINCT client_ip) as "UV",avg(responsetime) as "平均响应时间",avg(response_length) as "平均返回量"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
	GROUP BY `path`
  order by COUNT() DESC
	LIMIT 30;

SELECT
	  `path` as "请求路径",avg(response_length) as "平均返回量", avg(responsetime) as "平均响应时间",COUNT() AS PV, COUNT(DISTINCT client_ip) as "UV"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
	GROUP BY `path`
  order by avg(response_length) DESC
	LIMIT 30;

SELECT toStartOfMinute(timestamp) AS time, top_path
	, countIf(responsetime > 0.5) AS slow_requests
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) 
GROUP BY time, top_path
HAVING slow_requests > 0
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfMinute(timestamp) AS time, countIf(responsetime > 0.5) AS slow_requests
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) 
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: TOP_Path大于500ms请求，占整体大于500ms请求的比例

targets.rawSql:
SELECT toStartOfMinute(timestamp) AS time, top_path
	, countIf(responsetime > 0.5) AS slow_requests
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) 
GROUP BY time, top_path
HAVING slow_requests > 0
ORDER BY time

panels.title: TOP_Path每分钟耗时大于500ms的请求数

targets.rawSql:
SELECT toStartOfMinute(timestamp) AS time, top_path,sum(response_length) as "返回量"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) 
GROUP BY time, top_path
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfMinute(timestamp) AS time, sum(request_length) * 8 / 60 as "每秒请求量"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) 
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfMinute(timestamp) AS time, sum(response_length) * 8 / 60 as "每秒返回量"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) 
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 10 MINUTE) AS time, COUNT() as "应用"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and (http_user_agent like '%Java%' OR http_user_agent like '%python%')
	GROUP BY time
  order by time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 10 MINUTE) AS time, COUNT() as "爬虫"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and (http_user_agent like '%spider%' OR http_user_agent like '%bot%')
	GROUP BY time
  order by time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time,avg(responsetime) as "平均",top_path
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and status=200
GROUP BY time,top_path
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time,quantileExact(0.90)(responsetime) as P90,top_path
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and status=200
GROUP BY time,top_path
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 60 SECOND) AS time, COUNT(DISTINCT client_ip) AS "唯一IP数"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
	GROUP BY time
  order by time

SELECT
	  client_ip as "用户IP", 
    COUNT() AS PV, COUNT(DISTINCT `path`) as "请求URL数",sum(response_length) as "接收数据量"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
	GROUP BY client_ip
  order by PV DESC
	LIMIT 30;

SELECT
	  client_region, 
    COUNT() AS "未解析"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
	GROUP BY client_region

SELECT
	  client_city, 
    COUNT() AS "未解析"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
	GROUP BY client_city

SELECT
	  client_os_family, 
    COUNT() AS "未解析"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
	GROUP BY client_os_family

SELECT
	  client_browser_family, 
    COUNT() AS "未解析"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
	GROUP BY client_browser_family
  order by COUNT() DESC
	LIMIT 10;

SELECT
	  client_device_model, 
    COUNT() AS "总数"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and client_device_model != ''
	GROUP BY client_device_model
  order by COUNT() DESC
	LIMIT 10;

SELECT
	  client_device_brand, 
    COUNT() AS "总数"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and client_device_brand != ''
	GROUP BY client_device_brand
  order by COUNT() DESC
	LIMIT 10;

SELECT client_region as "省份",client_city as "城市",avg(responsetime) as "响应时间",count() as "PV",COUNT(DISTINCT client_ip) as UV
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and status=200
group by client_region,client_city

panels.title: 最近1分钟各城市HTTP200平均响应时间与PV

targets.rawSql:
SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time, client_city, count() / 15 AS avgqps
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
	GROUP BY time,client_city
  order by time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time,avg(responsetime) as "平均",client_city
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and status=200 
GROUP BY time,client_city
having count()/15 > 1
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time,quantileExact(0.90)(responsetime) as P90,client_city
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and status=200
GROUP BY time,client_city
having count()/15 > 1
ORDER BY time

SELECT COUNT() AS PV, client_latitude as latitude ,client_longitude as longitude,client_city as "城市",client_region as "省份"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
	GROUP BY client_latitude,client_longitude,client_city,client_region

SELECT avg(responsetime) as "响应时间", client_latitude as latitude ,client_longitude as longitude,client_city as "城市",client_region as "省份"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and status=200
	GROUP BY client_latitude,client_longitude,client_region,client_city

panels.title: 最近5分钟HTTP200平均响应延迟分布

defaults.noValue: 未输入分析接口或无数据

targets.rawSql:
SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time,
  quantileExact(0.99)(responsetime) as P99
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and status=200 and path='${uri}'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time,
  quantileExact(0.90)(responsetime) as P90
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and status=200 and path='${uri}'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time,
  quantileExact(0.50)(responsetime) as P50
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and status=200 and path='${uri}'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time,
  quantileExact(0.75)(responsetime) as P75
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and status=200 and path='${uri}'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time,
  quantileExact(0.95)(responsetime) as P95
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and status=200 and path='${uri}'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time,avg(responsetime) as "平均"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and status=200 and path='${uri}'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

defaults.noValue: 未输入分析接口或无数据

targets.rawSql:
SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time,upstreamhost,avg(responsetime) as rt
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and path='${uri}'
GROUP BY time,upstreamhost
ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time,avg(responsetime) as rt
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and path='${uri}'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

defaults.noValue: 未输入分析接口或无数据

targets.rawSql:
SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time, upstreamhost, count() / 15 AS avgqps
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and path='${uri}'
	GROUP BY time,upstreamhost
  order by time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp, INTERVAL 15 SECOND) AS time, count() / 15 AS avgqps
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and path='${uri}'
	GROUP BY time
  order by time

panels.title: 各后端每秒收到请求数(QPS)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toStartOfMinute(timestamp) as time,
  count() as value,toString(status) as "状态"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(time) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and path='${uri}'
GROUP BY time,status
ORDER BY time

SELECT timestamp, status, request_method, domain,query,server_ip,upstreamhost,responsetime,upstreamtime,request_length,response_length,client_ip,client_city
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and status=200 and path = '${uri}'

order by timestamp desc
limit 100

panels.title: 【$uri】请求明细TOP100（本页所有图表均关联该接口）

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	  client_ip as "用户IP", 
    COUNT() AS PV, avg(responsetime) as "平均响应时间"
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and path='${uri}'
	GROUP BY client_ip
  order by PV DESC
	LIMIT 30;

matcher.options: /路径|方法|域名|参数|状态|NGINX|后端|城市|用户IP/

targets.rawSql:
SELECT timestamp, status, request_method, domain,path,query,server_ip,upstreamhost,responsetime,upstreamtime,request_length,response_length,client_ip,client_city
	FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and server_ip in (${server_ip}) and status=200

order by timestamp desc
limit 500

list.definition:
select path FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
	group by path
	order by count() desc
limit 1000
list.description: 请选择请求URI（列表仅展示时间范围内请求量前1000的URI），如未找到，可直接输入完整的请求URI（不包含参数），如：/StarsL/api
list.label: 指定接口分析
list.name: uri
list.query:
select path FROM ${project}
	WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and server_ip in (${server_ip})
	group by path
	order by count() desc
limit 1000

title: NGINX请求日志分析看板 20241007 StarsL.cn
